title: Dope, i really like champion select and people crying about not getting their roles.
body:

replies.body:
Remember naming and shaming is against the [board rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules).

This time I've only replaced the names, but if you do this again in the future you may be facing a temporary ban from the boards. You're always welcome to post about a negative experience, but leave/edit summoner names out.
I just went to op.gg to check out the names and added these fools to my censor list :)
Good idea! Although I'm not sure how you found the game, I beleive someone ended up dodging :D
